episodes.title: Peter Engel
episodes.summary:
Legendary TV producer Peter Engel (Saved by the Bell, Last Comic Standing) talks about how he wanted to work in television from the very moment he saw a TV.  We discuss his journey from an starting as an NBC page to creating some of television's most beloved shows.  He also shares insight into the magic of Saved by The Bell.

For more of Peter's stories, check out his new book "I Was Saved by The Bell: Stories of Live, Love, and Dreams that Do Come True"

Host: Chris Laxamana
ChrisLaxamana.com

episodes.title: Rich Redmond
episodes.summary:
Drummer Rich Redmond shares his experience performing in sold out arenas with artists like Jason Aldean, Kelly Clarkson, and more.  He also recalls his journey to becoming a professional musician and talks about being a writer, speaker, and actor as well.

For more with Rich, visit RichRedmond.com

Host: Chris Laxamana
ChrisLaxamana.com
